_header: Saint Bernard born was at Bourgogne
Subjects: Bernard, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Bernard, in Vernon Golden Legend — in short couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Bernard born was at BurgoyneIn þe Castel men calleþ
                    ffountayne…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God for þe loue of seint BernardOf heueneriche blisse
                    ȝeue us part. Amen

Doyle,  I. A.,
